::: {#hero-heading}
I am a **postdoctoral researcher** at the Department of General Psychology, University of **Padova**, Italy. 

My research interests include computational models of **cognition**, **Bayesian** statistics, and **metascience**. 

I am a member of [Psicostat](https://psicostat.dpss.psy.unipd.it/){target="_blank"}, an interdisciplinary research group working at the intersection of **psychology** and **statistics**. In addition to our research activities, we offer [short courses and workshops](https://psicostat.github.io/psicostat-teaching/){target="_blank"} on quantitative methods.
:::
